sections.content: GAME4FUNPCS warrants to the original purchaser that all included core hardware components (excluding peripherals, software, and accessories) will be free from defects in materials and workmanship for the duration of the purchased warranty plan, beginning from the date of delivery.
This warranty is non-transferable and applies only to the original purchaser named on the invoice. Proof of purchase is required for all warranty claims.
Repairs or replacements may involve new or equivalent-grade refurbished parts. All systems are eligible for warranty extension at the time of purchase.
